scripts.release:patch: pnpm version:patch && git add -A && git commit -m 'chore: bump version to patch' && pnpm build && pnpm -r publish --access public && git push
scripts.release:minor: pnpm version:minor && git add -A && git commit -m 'chore: bump version to minor' && pnpm build && pnpm -r publish --access public && git push
scripts.release:major: pnpm version:major && git add -A && git commit -m 'chore: bump version to major' && pnpm build && pnpm -r publish --access public && git push
